FILE: cm740850v11.0.txt
DYAD: JAPAN - INDONESIA
RIVALRY: RIV1335
DISPUTE(S): MID2894 MID2914 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190520
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190520

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2894 

TERRMID: MID2894 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2894 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2894 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2894 from Gibler 2018, in 1963 Indonesia seized a Japanese fishing vessel in their territorial waters. Coded not maritime because this was not connected to a maritime dispute. From IBRU, Japan and Indonesia did not dispute a maritime boundary. 

ISLMID: MID2894 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2894 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2894 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2894 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2894 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2894 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2914 

TERRMID: MID2914 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2914 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2914 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2914 from Gibler 2018, in 1965 Indonesia seized two Japanese fishing boats in their territorial waters. Coded not maritime because from IBRU, the countries did not dispute a maritime boundary. 

ISLMID: MID2914 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2914 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2914 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2914 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2914 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2914 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
